youtube.title: RAG Eval Pipeline: Master Consistent AI Responses #Shorts
youtube.description: Design a robust evaluation pipeline for production RAG systems. This video details an architectural workflow, integrating ground truth data, synthetic data generation, and automated metrics like Faithfulness, Relevance, and Context Recall. Understand how human evaluation, A/B testing, and a continuous feedback loop ensure high-quality, consistent Generative AI responses. Elevate your RAG system's performance today!

thumbnail.headline: RAG Eval Pipeline Explained
thumbnail.subheadline: Ensure High-Quality, Consistent AI Responses in Production

instagram.caption:

▸ Master Faithfulness, Relevance, and Context Recall in Generative AI.
▸ Implement human evaluation & A/B testing for continuous improvement.
